refnamediv.refpurpose: Multiplies and accumulates a- and k-rate signals.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Multiplies and accumulates a- and k-rate signals.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ares mac ksig1, asig1 [, ksig2] [, asig2] [, ksig3] [, asig3] [...]

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para:
mac multiplies and accumulates a- and k-rate signals. It is equivalent to:
ares = asig1*ksig1 + asig2*ksig2 + asig3*ksig3 + ...

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the mac opcode. It uses the file mac.csd. It is written for *NIX systems, and will generate errors on Windows.
